reviewText: viewers observe chemical reactions in nature and in the lab to uncover the difference between physical and chemical changes. They use models and travel to huge electric plants to explore the various parts of an electrical circuit, and see how current flows to provide the power we need to keep our world in motion. Part of a 6 volume series "Science Clips for students" Schlessinger Media/Library Video Company. 2003 British Broadcasting Corporation. 18 minutes.
